headline: ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW) on Substack by Kontra Investment Xchange. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NOW. ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW)’s share was trading at $1049.44 as of Nov 29th. NOW’s trailing and forward P/E were 163.46 and 62.50 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. ServiceNow, founded in 2004, […]
